<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/monitors/{id}/heartbeats"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Get paginated heartbeats for a monitor

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Monitor ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Number of heartbeats per page (default 50)","in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"description":"Page number (default 0)","in":"query","name":"page","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"description":"Filter by important heartbeats only","in":"query","name":"important","schema":{"type":"boolean"}},{"description":"Reverse the order of heartbeats","in":"query","name":"reverse","schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>

</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
